page.title: 08Fishing at Well Vale Lakes
page.content: There are 2 lakes on the estate of over 3 acres in total area. The fishing rights are leased by Alford and District Angling Club with over 360 members. Subscriptions are Â£1.50 for juniors and Â£8 for adults coarse fishing the lower lake, Â£50 per season for 20 permits to fish the upper Game lake. Current membership is 160 juniors, 200 adults and 54 Game fishermen. The game season is 1st. April to 14th. Oct. and the coarse season 16th. June to 14th. March. The lakes are spring fed, the upper lake stocked with Rainbow and Brown trout 2-3 times per year with the biggest recorded fish being about 6lb. A stream runs from the upper to the lower lake which is naturally stocked with Tench, Bream, Roach, Rudd, Carp, Perch, Pike and Eels.
